key: It's staff only. I don't want to get into any trouble.
original: It's staff only. I don't want to get into any trouble.
translation: 只有员工能进，我可不想惹上什么麻烦

key: Okay, let's go. I'm kind of nervous.
original: Okay, let's go. I'm kind of nervous.

key: Too late, I should come back tomorrow.
original: Too late, I should come back tomorrow.

key: Today is the \c[2]Weekend\c[0], I should come back on \c[12]Monday\c[0].
original: Today is the \c[2]Weekend\c[0], I should come back on \c[12]Monday\c[0].
translation: 今天是\c[2]周末\c[0]，我\c[12]周一\c[0]再来
